name: Cleaver Killer Clown: Sideshow Circus - FULL GAME
name_original: Cleaver Killer Clown: Sideshow Circus - FULL GAME
description:
BEST PLAYED FULL SCREEN.
CLICK ICON IN BOTTOM RIGHT CORNER.

Up - Jump

A - Attack

Enter - Pause 

R - Reload Level When Paused

CLEAVER : SIDESHOW CIRCUS is a retro style 8-bit video game from Mycho Digital, the new Digital media division of UK Horror Movie studio Mycho Entertainment.  Play as Cleaver : The Killer Clown as he sets out on a quest to collect balloons, meat and save his daughter Lil Ms Cleaver forte clutches of the Circus Du Sinister and its leader the Ring Master. With the help of exploding pumpkins and human hearts the Cleaver should make short work of the badguys in the classic style Single Screen Platformer.
